rules_text:
Vigilance
Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
When Dignified Sentinel dies, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, obscure the top two cards of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
